overview_of_class: In this course we will study the practical and research literature regarding teaching composition and improvisation in the schools, learn about the design of curricular materials for teaching sequences dealing with composition and improvisation, and compose and improvise using traditional and electronic means.
name: Teaching Composition in the Schools
title: MUSIC MUSIC_ED 368-0-20 Teaching Composition in the Schools

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In this course we will study the practical and research literature regarding teaching composition and improvisation in the schools, learn about the design of curricular materials for teaching sequences dealing with composition and improvisation, and compose and improvise using traditional and electronic means.

subject: MUSIC_ED
